title: List of all Androidpublish   to maven libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidpublish   to maven libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: gradle-maven-publish-plugin
repoList.description: Gradle plugin that configures an uploadArchives task to automatically upload all of your Java, Kotlin or Android libraries to any Maven instance.

repoList.name: android-base-library
repoList.description: Template project to create an Android library, which is ready to be published locally and on Bintray.

repoList.name: gradle-publish-plugin
repoList.description: Gradle plugin that supported publish all of your Java, Kotlin or Android libraries to any Maven Repository.

repoList.name: GradlePublish
repoList.description: The gradle files and guides for publish Java/Kotlin Android library to jfrog bintray and Maven/Jcenter

repoList.name: MavenPublisher
repoList.description: A handy Gradle plugin for publishing your maven packages (like Android AARs or Java JARs) to different kinds of repositories (like Bintray).

repoList.name: libraryPublishing
repoList.description: Publishing your own android library to local maven repository.

repoList.name: mavenPublisher
repoList.description: Script for publishing Java & Android libraries to Nexus server.

repoList.name: AndroidMavenPublishSample
repoList.description: Publish different flavor libraries to Maven. 发布不同 flavor 的 Android Library 到 Maven 仓库

repoList.name: Local-MavenRepository-Publish
repoList.description: Sample application to demonstrate Android library (.aar) publishing to local maven repository

repoList.name: android-studio-maven-local-issue
repoList.description: Library project using maven local to publish artifacts. Application using the artifact from maven local.
